mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user(user_idemail, user_state, user_name, user_nickname, user_phonenumber, user_password, user_profile, user_code) VALUES(#{user_idemail}, #{user_state}, #{user_name}, #{user_nickname}, #{user_phonenumber}, #{user_password}, #{user_profile}, #{user_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_password=#{user_password} WHERE user_idemail = #{user_idemail}
